titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University X892.8T88 O: Ṭūṭīʹnāmah

licence.#text: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library X892.8T88 O: Ṭūṭīʹnāmah are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

msContents.summary: Copy of the Ṭūṭīʹnāmah in the abridged and simplified version of Muḥammad Khudavānd Qādirī.

supportDesc.extent: i, 59, i foliated leaves : 220 x 171 (168 x 90) mm; bound to 225 x 183 x 14 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

binding.p: Marbled paper over pulpboard; red leather corners and spine; plain paper doublure.

origin.p: The copy is undated; possibly 19th century.

history.provenance: Formerly owned by Alexander I. Cotheal (stamps, f. 1r, 58v).
